LanguageData.VFEM2_HearthDarklight.label: darklight hearth
LanguageData.VFEM2_HearthDarklight.description: A large, tightly packed fire pit capable of holding high amounts of wood at once. Provides hefty warmth and light to thronerooms and halls alike and acts as a gathering spot for idle colonists.
LanguageData.VFEM2_HearthDarklight_Blueprint.label: darklight hearth (blueprint)
LanguageData.VFEM2_HearthDarklight_Frame.label: darklight hearth (building)
LanguageData.VFEM2_HearthDarklight_Frame.description: A large, tightly packed fire pit capable of holding high amounts of wood at once. Provides hefty warmth and light to thronerooms and halls alike and acts as a gathering spot for idle colonists.
